attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following the Governing party suffering its worst electoral performance for at least 40 years in the recent English and Welsh local elections, their defeat in the London Mayoral vote and yesterday's substantial loss in the Crewe and Nantwich by-election, it is clear the majority of the British people want new leadership. We the undersigned call on the Prime Minister to immediately call a General Election.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
